categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Arrow was a group of three CR90 corvettes in the Alliance Fleet. They were the third group of a three-wave corvette attack on the Imperial EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Red Wind.

The first two groups of corellian corvettes, Striker and Hammer, were obliterated by the frigate, but the Red Wind was eventually destroyed by the combined attack of the Arrow group and A-wing Red 1, flown by Keyan Farlander.
